div.p: This field specifies whether a beneficiary is entitled to Medicare benefits due to end stage renal disease (ESRD). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/esrd_ind
This code system https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-esrd-ind defines the following codes:

tr.td: the beneficiary does not have ESRDm
the beneficiary does not have ESRD

description.value: This field specifies whether a beneficiary is entitled to Medicare benefits due to end stage renal disease (ESRD). Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/esrd_ind

display.value: the beneficiary does not have ESRDm

definition.value: the beneficiary does not have ESRD
